schemacrawler.tools.executable

Class SchemaCrawlerExecutable

  • java.lang.Object
    • schemacrawler.tools.executable.SchemaCrawlerExecutable

  • public final class SchemaCrawlerExecutable
extends Object
    Wrapper executable for any SchemaCrawler command. Looks up the command registry, and instantiates the registered executable for the command. If the command is not a known command, SchemaCrawlerExecutable will check if it is a query configured in the properties. If not, it will assume that a query is specified on the command-line, and execute that.
    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi
